This is my first Rmarkdown trail!

I will plot some graphes using **Donation-Disease** dataset

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
setwd("~/Google Drive/Schoolwork/2014Fall/QMSS4063G/work_repo/Lab1")
dat <- read.table('Donation-Disease.csv',sep=',',header=T)
ggplot(dat,aes(x=Name,y=Death)) + geom_histogram(stat='identity')
```



Another graph! 
```{r}
ggplot(dat,aes(x=MoneyRaised,y=Death)) + geom_point() + geom_text(aes(label=Name),size=4) 

```
